name: Escape from Mount Doom
overview: A shareware role playing game from John Scott. Mt. Doom, long dormant is about to erupt! IN a futile attempt to prevent this, the cave dwelling Trogs have kidnapped Princess Elena and intend to sacrifice her to the mountain gods. Your mission is clear - inexperienced as you are, you must enter the caves, set her free and Escape From MOUNT DOOM!! There were two versions of this game, a PD demo version with limited scope and the full shareware version.
